.center[.size40[.content-box-white[**Mearsheimer (1994): Offensive Realism and Institutions**]]]

.size40[
- Powerful states create institutions to maintain or increase their power

- Institutions simply reflect the balance of power

- When the balance of power shifts so too should the institutions

Therefore, international institutions "have minimal influence on state behavior" (7).
]



---

background-image: url('libs/Images/background-blue_cubes_lighter3.png')
background-size: 100%
background-position: center
class: middle

.center[.size40[.content-box-white[**Mearsheimer (1994): Offensive Realism**]]]

<br>

.size40[
- International anarchy
- States have offensive military capacity
- Uncertainty re: intentions of other states
- Survival is primary goal
- States are strategic

Therefore, great powers fear each other, self-help is the rule and the goal of all states is power maximization.
]
